full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SNGAGS BTU RJES GNANG BZHUGS SO, ,

author_simple: RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO BLO GROS,
